mdRecord.dcterms:description: Expression of desire to join IMP society. Romantic question, with disappointing responses. Acronym FML ('fuck my life') with positive response offering a new acronym. Beginning of series of dates. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
I want to be an IMP so bad 9/9/13 | are you thinking of me, like I'm thinking of you? NO. --STFU-- | I got HW | SVT so very thankful ‚Üê --FML--
